alert.note: Alert for Northern Scott County; Southern and Eastern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 4:41PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Logan and northwestern Scott Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 441 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oliver, or 11 miles west of Waldron, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waldron... Oliver... Cauthron... Hon... Elm Park... Liberty... Winfield... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for western Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Northern Scott County; Southern and Eastern Logan County
